blogposting.articlebody: Theekshana back into the attack and Shakib has a crack at him. Sits down and has a sweep down backward square leg for four. Then, makes the most of the width outside the off stump with a cut...

blogposting.articlebody: Right then. Angelo Mathews comes in to bowl his first over. With that dismissal behind him. With a look of focus, and a crucial two points on the line. And he almost nabs a big wicket! The...

blogposting.articlebody: Chameera into his second over. Another economical over this from him. Just the three runs come off it. Side note: the dew has started to play it's role. A massive slip of the ball leading to...

blogposting.articlebody: Madushanka into a fifth over. Fifty comes up for Sri Lanka. Shanto advances down the track and meets a length ball on the up with a flick shot that runs down deep square leg for four.

blogposting.articlebody: Dushmantha Chameera into the attack. Goes short and Shakib Al Hasan swivels across to claim a pull shot for four runs. Fine leg gives it a chase but it's timed well.

blogposting.articlebody: Madushanka with a fine over from the other end. The left armer has been Sri Lanka's top wicket taker at this tournament but he's also put a lid on runs. Just like he did against India early...
blogposting.headline: Bangladesh vs Sri Lanka Live Score: After five overs, BAN are 28/1

blogposting.articlebody: Theekshana continues from the other end. He offers width outside the off stump and Shanto is up for it. Rocks deep in his crease before cutting it through covers for four. Fine shot early in...

blogposting.articlebody: GONE! Dilshan Madushanka strikes early, again! What a star he has been for Sri Lanka, despite their fate at this World Cup. Almost the same off cutter that got the better of Rohit Sharma at...

blogposting.articlebody: Maheesh Theekshana into the game very early. The dew has come into play already at Kotla and Sri Lanka would want to give Theekshana the best chance to get his grip in place. Off his first...

blogposting.articlebody: It's not been the best of tournaments for the young Bangladesh opener but he's got off to a fine start here. Back to back boundaries off Madushanka's first over. An uppish drive through covers...

blogposting.headline: Bangladesh vs Sri Lanka Live Score:100 and gone!

blogposting.articlebody: What a knock, Asalanka and it is second and this has come at a crucial time for him and SL. Superb effort. A knock under tremendous pressure. Asalanka has played a mature knock here. SL: 270/7...

blogposting.headline: Bangladesh vs Sri Lanka Live Score: Dot balls build pressure
